Frontend Web Developer, Content Writer

In a love/hate relationship with Javascript but I love her still. Currently learning Sveltejs and React.

CONTACT ME

- @pablo_clueless -

I'm a Lagos-based self-taught Frontend web developer, learning about web development, design and open source contribution for more than a year now. I'm adept at HTML, CSS and some of it's frameworks like Sass and Bootstrap and honing my skill in JavaScript and Sveltejs to amp up my abilities. I've built several simple projects along the line and hoping to deliver more in the nearest future. I love to read and watch cartoons during my spare time. Out to gain maximum knowledge and experience.

- TECHNOLOGIES I USE -

Responsive and Adaptive Designs

Employing mobile first approach and media queries, I deliver responsive designs that look good on all devices and browsers.

Minimal code

I do my best to write minimal and reusable thereby reducing file size and loading time.

Pixel-perfect delivery

I deliver pixel perfect, user-friendly interface

SEO optimization

Engaging the best SEO practices including using semantic tags and meta descriptions & keywords, I improve your websites visibility and rankings on search engines.

- PROJECTS -

Here are some of my projects.

Red Velvet

Red Velvet is a fictional restaurant in the heart of Lagos. Built with the basic web technologies. It is one of my favorites.

HTML CSS

Music Player

I'm a huge fan of music so why not build a music player? With cool neomorphism design and a dash of JavaScript, it looks and feels good.

HTML CSS JavaScript

1203 Creations

Marketing site for a photograhy company. One of my earliest projects, built out of love and passion for media PS: I'm also a video editoer

HTML CSS

Text to Speech

A simple text app with language options, adjustable speech rate and pitch. Collaborations would be highly welcomed as I hope to make the app accessible to the visually-impaired. Feel free to submit pull requests or fork.

HTML Sass JavaScript

Starry Nights

I see the stars like fireflies dancing in the skies. This is one piece that I really really like; with some nice white noise, this animation helps me get better sleep

HTML CSS JavaScript

Handwashing App

A COVID-19 handwashing app with timer, timed to WHO recommended standard. Built using Sveltejs framework.

Sveltejs BlueprintCSS
